actions.description: 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description:
The dohwar casts the following spell, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 11):
3/day each: detect thoughts
actions.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)

languages: Common, Dohwar, telepathy 30 ft. (see also Merging below)
name: Dohwar [BAM]

specialTraits.description: Two dohwars can have a telepathic conversation with each other and a third willing creature of their choice, provided all three are within 30 feet of one another.
specialTraits.name: Merging
